On Tuesday November 14, 2017 The Fearless Group will be putting out a media brief related to our new project My Baby Way.
Initially we are looking to spend $1.0 million as a launch budget to buy media. We plan to run 30 sec TV spots, 15 sec TV spots, 15 sec pre-roll and other digital media.
$1.0 million is the launch budget and we forecast up to $10 million in spending (subject to sales) over the next 12-24 month.
If you would like to receive the media brief and RFP in advance of Tuesday please direct message me with your e mail address.

We are looking for innovative responses here and while traditional cash buying will be considered, we expect the winner of this initial launch opportunity (only) will include a performance based CPA offer or media for equity.
Thank you to all who attended yesterday's #DF17 panel. It was an honor to join our partners at MapAnything, Inc. for a valuable discussion about making field sales teams geo-productive.

According to Salesforce, data transformation in the Consumer Packaged Goods industry makes a huge impact on sales pipelines, productivity and revenue. I recently discussed the unique data challenges of CPG organizations with the VP of Marketing at Orion partner Scribe Software for an article in Upside.

Orion Global Solutions is a Cloud Advisory firm that drives customer success and growth through leadership and the effective deployment of cloud technology. In 25+ years in the CRM business, I've learned how challenging selecting and implementing technology can be for an organization.Choosing the right cloud platform for your business is mission critical. Our Cloud Advisory practice guides you through the process of choosing the right platform. The Orion Global team applies comprehensive technical knowledge and best practices to help customers ensure a greater return on investment.With laser-focus on the Salesforce platform, Orion Global Solutions implements and supports customized, cloud-based CRM solutions for businesses in the Real Estate, Financial Services/Private Equity, and CPG Industries, connecting their customers in new and exciting ways. Orion Global is an official Certified Salesforce Partner and provides assessment, implementation, support, and education that ensure customer success.Once you've chosen and implemented a platform, success depends on effective leadership. As the Chair of the YPO/WPO Navy SEAL Leadership Under Fire program, I learned first-hand how effective leadership can transform how a business operates. We use the leadership lessons of Navy SEALs in executing projects, and I've partnered with Rob Roy, president and founder of SOT-G, to offer an executive leadership program based on Navy SEAL Leadership Practices.I'm building the Orion Global team with passionate people who are driven to deliver results above and beyond customers' expectations. Orion Global team members are results driven and strive to embody Orion Global’s core values of creativity, integrity, community, and respect. They strive to be the best and to build an exciting culture of success.Please join me as a team member, business partner, or client as we build our winning team!Visit Orion Global at www.orion-gs.com or reach me at info@orion-gs.com.

summary: Yacov Wrocherinsky is founder and CEO of Orion Global Solutions. An experienced and knowledgeable entrepreneur, Yacov is passionate about people, culture, technology, and helping companies grow.He founded Infinity Info Systems in 1987. Under Yacov’s leadership, Infinity grew into a leader in ACT!, Sage Saleslogix CRM, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, and business intelligence solutions with 90+ employees, four successful partner acquisitions, $18.5mm in revenue, 3,500 successful CRM implementations, over 30 global projects, and 130,000 people trained before being sold in 2014.He has received numerous industry awards, including U.S. Small Business Administration Person of the Year for New York City and New York State. Yacov is an active member of YPO/WPO and Vistage, and has served on the Sage, Saleslogix, eXtremeCRM, and Microsoft Partner advisory boards. For many years, he served as the chair of the YPO/WPO Navy SEAL Leadership Under Fire program. He has been featured in numerous publications, including the Wall Street Journal, Inc., Fortune, and CRM Magazine.
name: Yacov Wrocherinsky
title: President & CEO at Orion Global Solutions
